desc: Medical grade air purifier to eliminate the widest range of pollutants such as viruses, bacteria, allergens, smoke and more. The AtmosC PFF-9 technology uses a 9 step filtration process including UV technology to destroy the most harmful pollutants.

layout.text: “We can breathe better thanks to my AtmosC air purifier. We can feel the difference in air quality in our apartment” – Jason Family
